andrewyng/translation-agent

Python demo for customizable machine translation using LLMs and reflection workflow

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Python application for book translation with local LLMs
  • PyTorch-like toolkit for building and auto-optimizing LLM workflows, from chatbots to agents
  • Python library that aggregates multiple translation services
  • automates research workflows with LLM agents from idea to report
  • Autofills Django translations using LLMs
  • Coordinate specialized agents in Python with LangGraph Supervisor, a library for managing multi-agent workflows using a central supervisor
  • Multi-agent framework for building collaborative LLM applications
  • Stock trading backtesting system using large language models
  • Automates code implementation with planning and execution
